Effects: Load SLA configuration by task's slaTypeCode; Compute SLA deadline from SLAType duration; Initialize SLA tracking info; Route task to queue and set priority; Audit record for task creation
Assign task to the claiming worker; Audit record for task claim; Emit task claimed domain event
Record completion outcome from request; Audit record for task completion; Create follow-up task when requested
Clear assignment so task returns to queue; Audit record for task release; Re-evaluate routing rules for released task
